snippet: The retailer said it was investigating a report that customer credit and debit card data was stolen from its systems and put up for sale online.
abstract: Home Depot says that it is investigating report that customer credit and debit card data was stolen from its systems and put up for sale online, becoming the latest in string of retailers dealing with consumer information theft.
lead_paragraph: The retailer said it was investigating a report that customer credit and debit card data was stolen from its systems and put up for sale online.

headline.main: Home Depot Investigates a Possible Credit Card Breach
headline.print_headline: Home Depot Investigates a Possible Data Breach
